00023    /*
00024    * Constructor.
00025    */
00026    AtomCollector::AtomCollector() 
00027     : domainPtr_(0),
00028       bufferPtr_(0),
00029       source_(-1),
00030       recvBufferSize_(-1),
00031       recvArraySize_(-1),
00032       recvArrayId_(-1),
00033       isComplete_(false)
00034    {}
00035 
00036    /*
00037    * Destructor.
00038    */
00039    AtomCollector::~AtomCollector() 
00040    {}

00042    /*
00043    * Retain pointers to associated objects.
00044    */
00045    void AtomCollector::associate(Domain& domain, AtomStorage& storage, 
00046                                  Buffer& buffer)
00047    {
00048       domainPtr_  = &domain;
00049       storagePtr_ = &storage;
00050       bufferPtr_  = &buffer;
00051    }
00052 
00053    /*
00054    * Allocate atom cache (call only on master).
00055    */
00056    void AtomCollector::allocate(int cacheCapacity)
00057    {
00058       if (recvArray_.capacity() > 0) {
00059          UTIL_THROW("Attempt to re-allocate receive cache");
00060       } 
00061       recvArray_.allocate(cacheCapacity); 
00062    }
00063 
00064    void AtomCollector::setup()
00065    {
00066       // Preconditions
00067       if (!domainPtr_) {
00068          UTIL_THROW("Collector not initialized");
00069       }
00070       if (!domainPtr_->isInitialized()) {
00071          UTIL_THROW("Domain is not initialized");
00072       }
00073       if (!domainPtr_->isMaster()) {
00074          UTIL_THROW("Not the master processor");
00075       }
00076       if (!bufferPtr_->isInitialized()) {
00077          UTIL_THROW("Buffer not allocated");
00078       }
00079       if (recvArray_.capacity() <= 0) {
00080          UTIL_THROW("Atom cache not allocated");
00081       }
00082 
00083       source_ = 0;          // rank of source node
00084       recvBufferSize_ = 0;  // number of atoms in MPI buffer 
00085       recvArraySize_ = 0;   // number of atoms in recvArray_ 
00086       recvArrayId_ = 0;     // id of current atom in recvArray_
00087       isComplete_ = false;  // not finished with current processor
00088 
00089       // Initialize Atom iterator on master processor.
00090       storagePtr_->begin(iterator_);
00091    }
00092 
00093    #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00094    /*
00095    * Returns address for a new Atom.
00096    */ 
00097    Atom* AtomCollector::nextPtr()
00098    {
00099       // Preconditions
00100       if (domainPtr_ == 0) {
00101          UTIL_THROW("AtomCollector has not been initialized");
00102       }
00103       if (!domainPtr_->isInitialized() != 0) {
00104          UTIL_THROW("Domain is not initialized");
00105       }
00106       if (!domainPtr_->isMaster()) {
00107          UTIL_THROW("Not the master processor");
00108       }
00109 
00110       // If master processor
00111       Atom* ptr;
00112       if (source_ == 0) {
00113          if (iterator_.notEnd()) {
00114             ptr = iterator_.get();
00115             ++iterator_;
00116             return ptr;
00117          } else {
00118             recvBufferSize_ = 0;
00119             recvArraySize_ = 0;
00120             recvArrayId_ = 0;
00121             isComplete_ = true;
00122          }
00123       }
00124      
00125       // While at end of recvArray_, or while array is empty.
00126       while (recvArrayId_ == recvArraySize_) {
00127 
00128          // If receive buffer is empty
00129          if (recvBufferSize_ == 0) {
00130 
00131             // If processing of items from processor source_ is complete.
00132             if (isComplete_) {
00133                ++source_;
00134                recvArraySize_ = 0;
00135                recvArrayId_ = 0;
00136                isComplete_ = false;
00137                // If last processor is complete, return null pointer.
00138                if (source_ == domainPtr_->grid().size()) {
00139                   source_ = 0;
00140                   return 0;
00141                }
00142             }
00143 
00144             // Send request to processor source_ 
00145             int message = source_;
00146             domainPtr_->communicator().Send(&message, 1, MPI::INT, 
00147                                                source_, message);
00148       
00149             // Receive buffer from processor source_
00150             bufferPtr_->recv(domainPtr_->communicator(), source_);
00151             isComplete_ = bufferPtr_->beginRecvBlock();
00152             recvBufferSize_ = bufferPtr_->recvSize();
00153          }
00154 
00155          // Unpack atoms from buffer into recvArray_.
00156          if (recvBufferSize_ > 0) {
00157             recvArraySize_ = 0;
00158             recvArrayId_ = 0;
00159             while (bufferPtr_->recvSize() > 0 
00160                    && recvArraySize_ < recvArray_.capacity()) 
00161             {
00162                bufferPtr_->unpackAtom(recvArray_[recvArraySize_]);
00163                ++recvArraySize_;
00164                --recvBufferSize_;
00165                if (recvBufferSize_ != bufferPtr_->recvSize()) {
00166                   UTIL_THROW("Inconsistent buffer receive counters");
00167                }
00168             }
00169          }
00170 
00171       }
00172 
00173       // Return current item from recvArray.
00174       ++recvArrayId_;
00175       return &recvArray_[recvArrayId_ - 1];
00176 
00177    }
00178 
00179    /*
00180    * Send all atoms from this process.
00181    *
00182    * Call on every processor except the master.
00183    */
00184    void 
00185    AtomCollector::send()
00186    {
00187 
00188       // Preconditions
00189       if (!bufferPtr_->isInitialized()) {
00190          UTIL_THROW("Buffer not allocated");
00191       }
00192       if (!domainPtr_->isInitialized()) {
00193          UTIL_THROW("Domain is not initialized");
00194       }
00195       if (domainPtr_->isMaster()) {
00196          UTIL_THROW("AtomCollector::send() called from master node.");
00197       }
00198 
00199       // Initialize atom iterator
00200       storagePtr_->begin(iterator_);
00201 
00202       isComplete_= false;
00203       while (!isComplete_) {
00204 
00205          // Receive notice from master to send atoms (blocking receive)
00206          int message;
00207          int tag = domainPtr_->communicator().Get_rank();
00208          domainPtr_->communicator().Recv(&message, 1, MPI::INT, 0, tag);
00209 
00210          // Pack buffer with atoms
00211          int recvArraySize_ = 0;
00212          isComplete_ = iterator_.atEnd();
00213          bufferPtr_->clearSendBuffer();
00214          bufferPtr_->beginSendBlock(Buffer::ATOM);
00215          while (recvArraySize_ < bufferPtr_->atomCapacity() && !isComplete_) {
00216             bufferPtr_->packAtom(*iterator_);
00217             ++recvArraySize_;
00218             ++iterator_;
00219             isComplete_ = iterator_.atEnd();
00220          }
00221          bufferPtr_->endSendBlock(isComplete_);
00222 
00223          // Send buffer to master
00224          bufferPtr_->send(domainPtr_->communicator(), 0);
00225 
00226       }
00227 
00228    }
00229    #endif
00230 
00231 }
